rewrite1:
Please adjust the formatting for the eighth paragraph by setting the Outline Level to 2. Then, modify the font color to the hexadecimal value of #FFFF00. Next, highlight the paragraph using the hex code #FF00FF. Finally, italicize the text for added emphasis.

For the second paragraph, set the line spacing to 1.5 lines and insert a space of 2.5 lines after the paragraph. Emphasize the text with a double underline and also apply italic formatting to give the text a slanted appearance.
rewrite2:
To format the eighth paragraph, set the Outline Level to Level 2. Adjust the font color to the hex value #FFFF00 and highlight the text using the hex code #FF00FF. Additionally, italicize the text.

For the second paragraph, set the line spacing to 1.5 lines and add a 2.5-line space after the paragraph. Apply a double underline to the text and format it to be italicized.
rewrite3:
Revised instructions:

"Proceed to the eighth paragraph and adjust the Outline Level to Level 2. Then, change the font color to a yellow shade using the hex code #FFFF00. Next, highlight the entire text in the paragraph with a pink color, using the hex code #FF00FF. Finish by setting the text to an italicized style.

Moving on to the second paragraph, set the line spacing to 1.5 lines and include a space of 2.5 lines after the paragraph. Enhance the text by applying a double underline and also italicize the font for added emphasis."
